title: I have a problem with the new client (removal of the legacy client)
body:
The problem i have with the new client is that when i open it, the login screen music sounds, but the league client has no animation and its black, i can't click anything and then the client freezes.
I don't know if this has something to do with the fact that i didn't choose to update the new client when it was in beta, i just updated the legacy client and had no problems playing in it, until now that i can't play because of this error.
I have re-installed league again to see if i'm missing some files but it happens anyways.
I would appreciate if i get some help with this issue, thanks.

replies.body: This black screen usually happens if there's a connection issue, so it can't download assets.  Reinstalling is solid, but we want to focus on connection here.  In this case, go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and how it reaches our servers.  I hope that helps!
